item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, April 21, 2025 at 7:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Blog is hosted on a Nintendo Wii (43 points | 9 comments)
2. Whistleblower statement on anomalies at time of DOGE work at NLRB [pdf] (31 points | 1 comment)
3. Show HN: Dia, an open-weights TTS model for generating realistic dialogue (118 points | 39 comments)
4. A New Form of Verification on Bluesky (98 points | 52 comments)
5. Adding keyword parameters to Tcl procs (30 points | 7 comments)
6. Launch HN: Magic Patterns (YC W23) – AI Design and Prototyping for Product Teams (78 points | 36 comments)
7. Propositional Parlor Puzzle (5 points | discuss)
8. Astronomers confirm the existence of a lone black hole (9 points | 4 comments)
9. Pipelining might be my favorite programming language feature (170 points | 150 comments)
10. Spark AI (YC W24) is hiring a full-stack engineer in San Francisco ( | hide)
11. FTC Takes Action Against Uber for Deceptive Billing and Cancellation Practices (99 points | 34 comments)
12. How I use Kate editor (13 points | 2 comments)
13. Local LLM inference – impressive but too hard to work with (12 points | 6 comments)
14. Dumb statistical models, always making people look bad (23 points | 2 comments)
15. Getting forked by Microsoft (1355 points | 698 comments)
16. Out of the Fog (109 points | 22 comments)
17. Python's new t-strings (476 points | 347 comments)
18. Tabular Programming: A New Paradigm for Expressive Computing (47 points | 11 comments)
19. AI assisted search-based research works now (51 points | 36 comments)
20. Reworking 30 lines of Linux code could cut power use by up to 30 percent (197 points | 69 comments)
21. LLM-powered tools amplify developer capabilities rather than replacing them (145 points | 102 comments)
22. Reverse engineering the obfuscated TikTok VM (345 points | 101 comments)
23. Fossil fuels fall below 50% of US electricity for the first month on record (142 points | 129 comments)
24. Decentralizing Schemes (19 points | 3 comments)
25. Show HN: Nerdlog – Fast, multi-host TUI log viewer with timeline histogram (82 points | 30 comments)
26. Show HN: Light like the Terminal – Meet GTK LLM Chat Front End (11 points | 4 comments)
27. Haskelling My Python (113 points | 47 comments)
28. Taking Notes with Joplin (76 points | 43 comments)
29. The campaign to subvert Africa's internet registry (61 points | 14 comments)
30. The Computer Revolution Hasn't Happened Yet (1997) [video] (17 points | 1 comment)
